channel.title: [718] A Coder or Two Needed
channel.description:
Hello all,
I am currently needing a coder (MAYBE two), who is fluent in Java to help me with my server.
Also, I'm sorta new to Java, (not extremely new to coding, as I'm well-oriented with Visual Basic & Python.) But there are a fair amount of things that I'm not the best at when it comes to this language. I can understand the majority of it, but I need a decent amount of knowledge if I'm going to make a successful server.
Now, if you are/have most of the following , than you just might be my guy/girl:
[center]Ability to work WELL with another person (listening to ideas, constructive criticism, etc.) Able to talk in a little bit more simplistic way with Java (I'm not the smartest guy in the world) Skype (HIGHLY recommended) A decent amount of EXPERIENCE with Java, along with the knowledge. My age or older (15, and this is for maturity reasons) Dedicated, hard-working, not quitting easily, and the ability to have fun the whole time =)[/center]
[u][b]Notes about the server[/b][/u]:
This server is Citellum 718 loading a 742 cache.
The server is hosted on MY computer (don't worry, 8 GBs will get it done. =)
If you have any questions, or are interested in joining, feel free to add me on Skype: adamtheman88
Thanks in advance,
[size=18pt]-Moidz[/size]
EDIT: I forgot to mention that I will probably need a Web Dev as well.

item.title: [718] A Coder or Two Needed
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

This forum does not allow transactions, i have removed your offer from your post so please do not replace it. Thank you.

Read full topic

Hello all,
